name: World Flags Quiz
description:
World Flags Quiz is a unique flag quiz which takes the flags of the world to the ...next level. In this flag quiz all country flags are available as well as the most region flags of the world. From the most famous flags like United States or China flag to the rarest like Vanuatu and St Pierre and Michelon. Guess the country flags and maps with the best education quiz ever! Learn all the countries flags of the world! "Flags Quiz" is a free game full of fun that consists on guessing the names of hundreds of countries flags from around the world. How many of world flags can you recognize?

FEATURES
* more than 200 country flags!
* pleasant music
* beautiful graphics
* frequent application updates!
